bibl.title: 1814 Dec. 30, Chocktaw [Nation, to] James Winchester, Mobile [Alabama] / John McKee
bibl.author: McKee, John
bibl.note: This is a letter from Colonel John McKee to Brigadier General James Winchester, dated December 30, 1814. McKee is the U.S. agent to the Choctaw Nation. McKee is reporting an order he received from General Jackson. McKee is to round up as many Choctaws as he can to help in the war against England.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.p: I had yesterday the honor of receiving your letter of the 20th instant

I have a letter from Genl Jackson of the 22 in which he says "I wish you to have them (the Chocktaws) forthwith enrolled in the "service of the United States, and as many of "them as you may be able to procure as may be "prepar'd for active service marched to join me "at this point, or at such other as may be directed "as soon as you can possibly get them into the "the field I will immediately set about enrolling & embodying the Chocktaws which will afford you time for consulting Genl Jackson on their destination indeed from the number out hunting and the absence of some of their principle leaders we will be able to muster but few at a short notice, Mr Dinsmoor who will command them will go immediately to the lw towns to collect as many there as possible and will be joined by the warriors of the other districts as soon as they can be collected, he will advise you from thence what may be expected

closer.salute:
I have the honor to be
with very great respect & esteem
Your Obedient Servant

address.addrLine: Comm. of E. Sec. of My District
comm of E. Sec. of My District

closer.add:
Col Jno McKee
Chocktaw Agency
dec 1815
